errors.error_description: The installation command uses the incorrect package name `python-bitstring` instead of the correct PyPI package name `bitstring`.
correction_candidates: Change the package name in the command to `bitstring`: `$ pip install bitstring`
Use `pip search` to find the correct package name first.
Install from the GitHub repository directly: `$ pip install git+https://github.com/scott-griffiths/bitstring.git`
Try installing with `pip3` instead of `pip`: `$ pip3 install python-bitstring`
errors.golden_answer: Change the package name in the command to `bitstring`: `$ pip install bitstring`
